author: 24LopezR
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements new version of ETL geometry (v8) that includes modules with several LGAD sensors (2 in this case). This geometry is integrated in MTD I17 and CMS D104.
The details about the motivation and implementation can be found in these presentations:
- [MTD DPG (10/11)](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1344170/#38-etl-geometry-update)
- [MTD DPG (13/10)](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1334483/#35-status-of-etl-geometry-and)
- [MTD DPG (09/06)](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1293576/#29-etl-geometry-update-of-sens)

#### PR validation:

For validation, a TTbar 14TeV has been run with the nominal code in D98 geometry, and the new code in D98 and D104 geometries. We observe (see attached plot):
1. Older geometries remain untouched.
2. The size of the ETL sensor is halved as expected.
3. The number of events recorded is about 10% higher, as the logical area of the pixels has been increased.
